itemEum.name: Ritual of Pact (Advanced)
itemEum.desc: Ritual of Pact(Advanced):member limit is 1,000;effective for 15 days; leeway perod is 7 days.
itemEum.itemDesc: It allows alliance to increase member limit to 1,000 once applied, which is effective for 15 days, while multiple applications of this item can lengthen the effective period. Once the item effect is due, 7-day leeway is given to the alliance. During this time, new members are denied to be recruited to the alliance. If no further application of the item, the alliance disbands automatically once the 7-day leeway period passes.

itemEum.name: Ritual of Pact (Premium)
itemEum.desc: Ritual of Pact (Premium): member limit is 1,000; effective for 30 days; leeway period is 7 days.
itemEum.itemDesc: It allows alliance to increase member limit to 1,000 once applied, which is effective for 30 days, while multiple applications of this item can lengthen the effective period. Once the item effect is due, 7-day leeway is given to the alliance. During this time, new members are denied to be recruited to the alliance. If no further application of the item, the alliance disbands automatically once the 7-day leeway period passes.

itemEum.name: Ritual of Pact (Ultimate)
itemEum.desc: Ritual of Pact (Ultimate): member limit is 1,000; effective for 90 days; leeway period is 7 days.
itemEum.itemDesc: It allows alliance to increase member limit to 1,000 once applied, which is effective for 90 days, while multiple applications of this item can lengthen the effective period. Once the item effect is due, 7-day leeway is given to the alliance. During this time, new members are denied to be recruited to the alliance. If no further application of the item, the alliance disbands automatically once the 7-day leeway period passes.

itemEum.name: Speaker
itemEum.desc: Used while speaking in World channel and sending group message.
itemEum.itemDesc: It costs one Speaker per sentence while chatting in World channel; sending group message costs two.

itemEum.name: Speaker (10 pieces package)
itemEum.desc: Used while speaking in World channel and sending group message.
itemEum.itemDesc: It includes 10 Speakers. Speaking in World channel costs one, while sending group message costs two. Unpack automatically when purchased.

itemEum.desc: Used while speaking in World channel and sending group message.
itemEum.itemDesc: It includes 100 Speakers. It costs one Speaker per sentence when chatting in World channel, while sending a group message costs two. Unpack automatically when purchased.

itemEum.itemDesc: Detailed guidelines of constructions and researches recorded. Great assistance to your city development.

itemEum.itemDesc: Detailed guidelines of constructions and researches recorded. Great assistance to your city development.

itemEum.name: Michelangelo's Script
itemEum.desc: It's a must for further upgrades for advanced buildings and resource fields.
itemEum.itemDesc: Michelangelo was an Italian Renaissance painter, sculptor, architect, poet and engineer. This script records the sketches of his which must bring great help to you.

itemEum.name: National Flag
itemEum.desc: Used to change text on Flag.
itemEum.itemDesc: It costs one National Flag to change your flag which displays above your city on the Map.

itemEum.name: Ritual of Pact
itemEum.desc: Instantly increase alliance member limit to 100 .
itemEum.itemDesc: Sacred ritual is written in this pact. It increases alliance member limit to 100.

itemEum.desc: Key to Bronze Lockbox.
itemEum.itemDesc: Exquisite bronze key, used to unlock Bronze Lockbox.

itemEum.name: Silver Key

itemEum.itemDesc: Exquisite silver key, used to unlock Silver Lockbox.

itemEum.name: Golden Key

itemEum.itemDesc: Exquisite Golden key, used to unlock Golden Lockbox.

itemEum.name: City Teleporter
itemEum.desc: Teleport your city to another location randomly.
itemEum.itemDesc: Select a state, and then teleport your city randomly. Any troops sent or garrison troops in your city is not allowed while teleporting.

itemEum.name: Hero Hunting
itemEum.desc: Refresh recruitment list in Inn.
itemEum.itemDesc: This is notice posted in city that to recruit heroes by offering considerable salary. Apply this item in Inn to refresh the list which may summon some high ranking heroes for employment.

itemEum.name: Merchant Fleet
itemEum.desc: Instantly finish the transportation from Market.
itemEum.itemDesc: Employs professional merchant team to transport resources. This items can finish recent transportation and transaction immediately.

itemEum.name: Legendary Ring
itemEum.desc: An ancient ring status unknown.It seems to be a ring wear by ancient heroes.
itemEum.itemDesc: An ancient ring status unknown.It seems to be a ring wear by ancient heroes.

itemEum.name: The Art of War
itemEum.desc: Increase a hero's intelligence by 25% when rewarded. Effective for 7 days.
itemEum.itemDesc: The Art of War, written by Chinese military strategist Sun Tzu, is widely read around the world. Being translated into different languages, it is a textbook of many military academies in this planet.

itemEum.name: Essential Oil
itemEum.desc: Recuperates hero's Strength by 100%.
itemEum.itemDesc: Various essential oils have been used medicinally at different periods in history. Medical application proposed by those who sell medicinal oils range from skin treatments to remedies for cancer, and are often based on historical use of these oils for these purposes.

itemEum.name: Lugui Wine
itemEum.desc: Recuperates hero's Strength by 30%.
itemEum.itemDesc: It’s said that emperors of ancient China were seeking methods to grant them immortality. They ordered their alchemists to work on this amrita. Those alchemists boiled, stewed and fried the turtle shells together with buckhorns, and then put them into the wine to infuse for a long time, thus the Lugui wine whose pronunciation was derived from Chinese articulation was done.

itemEum.name: Panax ginseng
itemEum.desc: Recuperates hero's Strength by 60%.
itemEum.itemDesc: American and Panax Ginseng root is believed by some to be an aphrodisiac. The root is most often available in dried form, either whole or sliced. Ginseng leaf,although not as highly prized,is sometimes also used. As with the root it is most often available in dried form.

itemEum.name: Tea
itemEum.desc: Recuperates hero's Strength by 10%.
itemEum.itemDesc: In many cultures, tea is often had at high class social events, such as?afternoon tea?and the?tea party. It may be consumed early in the day to heighten alertness. In ancient China, tea leaves were used as herbal medicine.

itemEum.name: Cross Medal
itemEum.desc: Increase a hero's Loyalty by 5 when rewarded. And it can be also used for hero Persuasion.
itemEum.itemDesc: Medal Reward is an important encouragement system. A country gives it as award to those who make outstanding contribution to the nation. Beside as award given to heroes, it can also used in the Persuasion of rival heroes.

itemEum.name: The Wealth of Nations
itemEum.desc: Increase a hero's Politics by 25% when rewarded. Effective for 7 days.
itemEum.itemDesc: Wealth of Nations is the magnum opus of the Scottish economist Adam Smith. It is a clearly written account of economics at the dawn of the Industrial Revolution, as well as a rhetorical piece written for the generally educated individual of the 18th century - advocating a free market economy as more productive and more beneficial to society.

itemEum.name: Excalibur
itemEum.desc: Increase a hero's attack by 25% when rewarded. Effective for 7 days.
itemEum.itemDesc: Excalibur, the legendary sword drawn out by King Arthur in the stone. Knight equipped with it sometimes attributed with magical power. Courageous as he is, triumph is for sure.

itemEum.name: Holy Water
itemEum.desc: Default hero's attributes. One more consumed every 10 levels.
itemEum.itemDesc: Heroes get sprayed by Holy Water will have faith. Default hero's attributes, and redistribute his potential points in order to enable him to focus on specific ability.

The Bavarian Brew must be used between Sep 28th and Oct 7th and is stackable for a maximum of 5 days, allowing you to increase the available buff time. On October 8th the buff will expire.

itemEum.desc: These chests are sent to you as Halloween gifts from your friends in the game. They require a Skeleton Key to open. itemEum.name: Trick Token

itemEum.itemDesc: A trick to scare the kids, a trick to take their heads. A trick to awaken the ground and fill it with those that stand against you.

itemEum.itemDesc: Blitzen's Flight Kit is all you need to bring some Christmas Cheer to unsuspecting victims. Appear out of nowhere, and share the gift of destruction.

itemEum.itemDesc: These chests are sent to you as Christmas gifts from your friends in the game. They require a Gingerbread Key to open. You can obtain a Gingerbread Key for every $30 worth of purchases made during Christmas. When opened, you will receive a random assortment of Krampus’ Sack of Holding, Chest of the Eissturm, Tactical Tannenbaum, War Chest of the Elves and Santa’s Trunk.

itemEum.itemDesc: Opening this gift will give you the following benefits:+15% to Heal for 24 hours,+25% to Resource Production for 24 hours,10% Speed to Recruiting queue for 24 hours,

itemEum.name: Devil token
itemEum.desc: This item gives one of the following types of items randomly: • Broken Gates – One can apply this item to another player to lock gates open, players can apply item on themselves to unlock gates • Opportunist’s Plague –Instantly kills the entire population of a target city and reduces repopulation by 10% for 4 hours• Lost in the Wastes –Troops from affected city march 20% slower than normal for 4 hours • Poisoned Feast –All heroes in targeted city lose 20% of all stats, includes energy in Age 2

itemEum.name: Angel token
itemEum.desc: This item gives one of the following types of items randomly: Fleet Feet – 35% Reduced Troop Marching Time for 4 hours. Endurance of the Immortals – 5% Increased Troop Hit Points for 12 hours.Alchemist’s Amplifier – 10% Stat increase to all heroes for 2 hours.

itemEum.itemDesc: The Harvester’s Bounty contains the best items found throughout the countryside, to aid in your efforts against your neighbors.

itemEum.itemDesc: The Holly King’s Favors appeared in the middle of the night, sparkling and attracting you in the weak light of the morning. What can be contained within the wrapping?

itemEum.itemDesc: Dear Julie, These daggers are for stabbing OTHER people only. Love, Romi

itemEum.itemDesc: This the package you received for your $30 cents purchase during the Valentine's Day promotion! This package is full of items hand-picked to make your more effective in game ! Happy Holidays

itemEum.name: Angel’s Boon
itemEum.desc: This item gives one of the following types of items randomly: • Fleet Feet – 30% Reduced Troop Marching Time,• Endurance of the Immortals – 5% Increased Troop Hit Points for 12 hours,• Alchemist’s Amplifier – 15% Stat increase to all heroes for 1 hour.
itemEum.itemDesc: The sky above promises to aid you in your upcoming battles.

itemEum.name: Pumpkin Package
itemEum.desc: These packages are delivered as gifts to players who purchased every 0 in Halloween!
itemEum.itemDesc: These packages are delivered as gifts to players who purchased every 0 in Halloween!

itemEum.name: Fleet Feet
itemEum.desc: Use of this item on another player will increase the marching speed of their troops by 35% for 4 hours, this item can be stacked a total of 2 times.
itemEum.itemDesc: Speed is an important factor in all military applications; the ability to outmaneuver an enemy will ensure success on the field, and off. Be fast, be strong.

itemEum.name: Endurance of the Immortals
itemEum.desc: Use of this item on another player will increase their troops’ hit points by 5% for 12 hours, this item can be stacked a total of 3 times.
itemEum.itemDesc: The endurance of a true immortal is unfailing, and they could singlehandedly change the tide of a battle. Through discipline and specialized training with a few helpful draughts, one can imbue their troops temporarily with endurance unmatched by normal man.

itemEum.name: Alchemist’s Amplifier
itemEum.desc: Use of this item on another player will increase the stats of all their heroes by 10% for 2 hour, this item can be stacked a total of 3 times.
itemEum.itemDesc: Alchemical advances have produced a draught that when taken in large doses causes exemplary heroes to become more powerful in all ways, alas… it is only temporary. For now.

itemEum.name: Devil’s Pact
itemEum.desc: A pact with the Devil can grant you power over your enemies, but at what price?
itemEum.itemDesc: This item gives one of the following types of items randomly:• Opportunist’s Plague – Instantly kills the entire population of a target city and reduces repopulation by 10% for 4 hours x2,• Lost in the Wastes – Troops from affected city march 15% slower than normal for 4 hours x3,• Poisoned Feast – All heroes in targeted city lose 10% of all stats, includes energy in Age 2 x3,• Broken Gates – gates are forced open or closed for a period of 1 hour on targeted city, player using the item can define if the gates are to be open or closed when the item is used x3

itemEum.name: Opportunist’s Plague
itemEum.desc: Use of this item on a chosen city will instantly kill the total population of the targeted city, and reduce their repopulation rate by 10% for 4 hours, this item can be used once every 24 hours per city.
itemEum.itemDesc: For ages various plagues have ravaged people, reducing their populations to almost nothing, and creating graveyards where once thriving cities existed.

itemEum.name: Lost in the Wastes
itemEum.desc: Use of this item on a targeted city will increase the march time of all troops by 20% for 4 hours, this item can be stacked a total of 3 times.
itemEum.itemDesc: Traveling through the unknown requires good navigation and smart scouts. Sometimes scouts disappear and compasses end up broken. Eventually the force will get home, but their march will be a long tedious trek through the unknown.

itemEum.name: Poisoned Feast
itemEum.desc: Use of this item on a targeted city will decrease the stats of all their heroes by 20% for 2 hours, this item can be stacked a total of 3 times.
itemEum.itemDesc: Poison is an effective tool to weaken and demoralize and opposing force. Used strategically it’s hard to detect and impossible to defend against. Weaken those who stand against you with a friendly meal.

itemEum.name: Broken Gates
itemEum.desc: Players can apply the item to another player to lock gates open for 1 hour, players can apply item on themselves to unlock gates, this can be used on a city a maxium 5 times per day.
itemEum.itemDesc: Good gates are important for defense. A smart attacker will learn the best way to ruin a city’s gates prior to attacking.

itemEum.name: Evony Easter Package
itemEum.desc: Contains Nation Medal, Justice Medal, Adv City Teleporter, City Teleporter (2), War Horn (2), Corselet (2), Amulet (4), Key of Lilies.
itemEum.itemDesc: Full of Easter goodies, including a Key of Lilies to open an Easter Chest!.

itemEum.itemDesc: 8% chance, worth 690 cents,2 x Excalibur,2 x On War,1 x Ivory Horn,1x Penicillin,2 x Ultra Corselet - Increase Army defense by 20% for 7 days,2 x Justice Medal - Awards one Justice medal,1x AdvTeleporter,1x Alchemist’s Amplifier

itemEum.name: Pumpkin Package
itemEum.desc: These packages are delivered as gifts to players who purchased every 0 in Halloween!
itemEum.itemDesc: These packages are delivered as gifts to players who purchased every 0 in Halloween!

itemEum.name: Silver Set
itemEum.desc: 5% chance, worth 770 cents,1 x Holy Helm of Mars,1x Vesta,2 x On Wars,1x Fleet Feet,1x Endurance of the Immortals,1 x Ivory Horn,1 x Ultra Corselet,1 x Adv. City Teleporter
itemEum.itemDesc: 5% chance, worth 770 cents,1 x Holy Helm of Mars,1x Vesta,2 x On Wars,1x Fleet Feet,1x Endurance of the Immortals,1 x Ivory Horn,1 x Ultra Corselet,1 x Adv City Teleporter

itemEum.name: Gold Set
itemEum.desc: 2% chance, worth 1000 cents,750 cents,2 x On Wars,1x Broken Gates
itemEum.itemDesc: 2% chance, worth 1000 cents,750 cents,2 x On Wars,1x Broken Gates

itemEum.name: Glod Medal Package
itemEum.desc: Opening this package will give you 5 Aries Amulets!
itemEum.itemDesc: This package was given to you during the Summer of Gold promotion and contains 5 Aries Amulets!

itemEum.name: Purchase Package
itemEum.desc: The Summer of Gold package is available for purchase during the Summer of Gold Promotion in July and Auguest of 2012!
itemEum.itemDesc: Opening the Summer of Gold Package will give you:2 x Amulets 1 x Adv City Teleporter, 2 x City Teleporter, 1 x Ivory Horn,1 x War Ensign

itemEum.name: Evonytoberfest War Package
itemEum.desc: These packages are delivered as gifts to players for every $30 worth of purchases made during our Evonytoberfest promotion.
itemEum.itemDesc: You can use this key to open one Saxon Beer Chest sent to you by your friends. If you don’t have any Saxon Beer Chests, you should ask your friends to send you some!

itemEum.name: Saxon Beer Chest
itemEum.desc: These chests are sent to you as Saxon Beer gifts from your friends in the game. They require a Saxony Chest Key to open. You can obtain a Saxony Chest Key for every $30 worth of purchases made during this promotion. When opened, you will receive the contents of Saxon Beer Chest A, B or C at random.
itemEum.itemDesc: These chests are sent to you as Saxon Beer gifts from your friends in the game. They require a Saxony Chest Key to open. You can obtain a Saxony Chest Key for every $30 worth of purchases made during this promotion. When opened, you will receive the contents of Saxon Beer Chest A, B or C at random.

itemEum.name: Thanksgiving Special Package A
itemEum.desc: Includes:Lion Medal,Rose Medal,Cross Medal,Plowshares,Arch Saw,Quarrying Tools,Blower,Freedom Medal,Justice Medal,Nation Medal,Hero Hunting,Amulet,Anabasis.
itemEum.itemDesc: These packages are delivered as gifts to players who purchased every 0 in Thanksgiving Day!

itemEum.name: Thanksgiving Special Package B
itemEum.desc: Includes:War Horn,Primary Guidelines,Beginner Guidelines,Justice Medal,Wisdom Medal,Courage Medal,Senior Guidelines,Lion Medal,Rose Medal,Cross Medal,Amulet,Corselet.
itemEum.itemDesc: These packages are delivered as gifts to players who purchased every 0 in Thanksgiving Day!

itemEum.name: Thanksgiving Special Package C
itemEum.desc: Includes:Hero Hunting,City Teleporter,Truce Agreement,Cross Medal,Rose Medal,Lion Medal,Intermediate Guidelines,Wisdom Medal,Honor Medal,War Horn,Primary Guidelines,Courage Medal,Justice Medal.
itemEum.itemDesc: These packages are delivered as gifts to players who purchased every 0 in Thanksgiving Day!

itemEum.name: Rabbits foot
itemEum.desc: This lucky rabbit’s foot will be your chance at riches! With a quick rub of the foot, you’ll give fortune 5 chances to shower you with gifts. What will you win?
itemEum.itemDesc: Using this item will give you 5 free spins on the Wheel of Fortune.

itemEum.name: Recall Package A
itemEum.desc: Includes: Amulet*10,Truce Agreement,Food 100000,Lumber 100000,Stone 100000,Iron 100000,Gold 100000.
itemEum.itemDesc: This package is delivered to players who haven't been playing the game for a while.It gives you some game items which may help you to return to the game.

itemEum.name: Recall Package B
itemEum.desc: Includes: Amulet*10,Truce Agreement,Michelangelo's Script,City Teleporter,Speech Text,Plowshares,Arch Saw,Quarrying Tools,Blower, Food 500000,Lumber 500000,Stone 500000,Iron 500000,Gold 500000.
itemEum.itemDesc: This package is delivered to players who haven't been playing the game for a while.It gives you some game items which may help you to return to the game.

itemEum.name: Recall Package C
itemEum.desc: Includes: Amulet*10,Truce Agreement,Michelangelo's Script*2,Adv City Teleporter,Speech Text,Iron Rake,Double Saw,Adv Quarrying Tools,Blast Furnace, Food 1000000,Lumber 1000000,Stone 1000000,Iron 1000000,Gold 1000000.
itemEum.itemDesc: This package is delivered to players who haven't been playing the game for a while.It gives you some game items which may help you to return to the game.

itemEum.name: Evony War Chest A
itemEum.desc: Includes: War Ensign, War Horn, Aries Amulet.
itemEum.itemDesc: These packages are presented to you as Christmas gifts from your friends in game.Need key to open.

itemEum.name: The Whole Bird
itemEum.desc: Includes: 2 x Excalibur,3 x On War,1 x Ivory Horn,2 x Ultra Corselet,5 x Justice Medal.
itemEum.itemDesc: What’s better than the dinner that keeps on giving? The items in this package that last *just* as long.

itemEum.name: Evony War Chest B
itemEum.desc: Includes: Epitome of Military Science, Adv City Teleporter, Wealth of Nations, Archimedes' Note.
itemEum.itemDesc: These packages are presented to you as Christmas gifts from your friends in game.Need key to open.

itemEum.name: Family Dinner
itemEum.desc: Includes: 2 x Epitome of Military Science,3 x Adv City Teleporter,1 x Wealth of Nations,2 x Archimede's Note.
itemEum.itemDesc: This package will ease the difficulty in traveling to far flung places to see your family, and break down their walls

itemEum.name: Evony War Chest C
itemEum.desc: Includes: Excalibur, On War, Ivory Horn, Ultra Corselet, Justice Medal.
itemEum.itemDesc: These packages are presented to you as Christmas gifts from your friends in game.Need key to open.

itemEum.name: Mash and Grab
itemEum.desc: Includes: 1 x War Ensign,2 x Adv City Teleporter,1 x War Horn,5 x Amulet.
itemEum.itemDesc: The perfect package for when you see someone got the last piece of pie, and you just HAVE to have it.

itemEum.name: Grand Resources
itemEum.desc: Includes: Food, Lumber, Stone and Iron 1,000,000 respectively; Gold 500,000.
itemEum.itemDesc: This package including huge amount of resources.

itemEum.name: Roman Building Kit
itemEum.desc: Rome wasn't built in a day, but they didn't have this many resources.
itemEum.itemDesc: Contains a LOT of resources!:1 Billion Food,200 Million Lumber,200 Million Iron

itemEum.name: Junior Medal Box
itemEum.desc: Offer 2 to 4 Cross Medals, Rose Medals and Lion Medals randomly once opened.
itemEum.itemDesc: Junior Medal Box This box includes 6 to 12 medals totally. It offers 2 to 4 Cross Medals, Rose Medals and Lion Medals randomly once opened.

itemEum.name: Medium Medal Box
itemEum.desc: Offer 2 to 4 Honor Medals, Courage Medals and Wisdom Medals randomly once opened.
itemEum.itemDesc: Medium Medal Box This box includes 6 to 12 medals totally. It offer 2 to 4 Honor Medals, Courage Medals and Wisdom Medals randomly once opened.

itemEum.name: Senior Medal Box
itemEum.desc: Offer 2 to 4 Freedom Medals, Justice Medals and Nation Medals randomly once opened.
itemEum.itemDesc: Senior Medal Box made This box includes 6 to 12 medals totally. It offer 2 to 4 Freedom Medals, Justice Medals and Nation Medals randomly once opened.

itemEum.name: Greater Daily Bonus
itemEum.desc: Awards Food 100000, Wood 100000, Stone 100000, Iron 100000, Gold 100000, and a chance of awarding an Aries Amulet.
itemEum.itemDesc: This is a Daily Bonus package from our Toolbar. The higher your Title is, the better bonuses you will receve.

itemEum.name: Lesser Daily Bonus
itemEum.desc: Awards Food 3000, Wood 3000, Stone 3000, Iron 3000, Gold 3000
itemEum.itemDesc: This is a Daily Bonus package from our Toolbar. The higher your Title is, the better bonuses you will receve.

itemEum.name: Medium Daily Bonus
itemEum.desc: Awards Food 30000, Wood 30000, Stone 30000, Iron 30000, Gold 30000,and a chance of awarding an Aries Amulet.
itemEum.itemDesc: This is a Daily Bonus package from our Toolbar. The higher your Title is, the better bonuses you will receve.

itemEum.name: Superior Daily Bonus
itemEum.desc: Awards Food 200000, Wood 200000, Stone 200000, Iron 200000, Gold 200000, and a chance of awarding an Aries Amulet.
itemEum.itemDesc: This is a Daily Bonus package from our Toolbar. The higher your Title is, the better bonuses you will receve.

itemEum.name: Superb Regiments
itemEum.desc: Includes: Cataphract 2000, Ballista 1000, Catapult 300.
itemEum.itemDesc: Advanced troops provided. Definitely a great blow to your enemies.

itemEum.name: Junior Battalion
itemEum.desc: Offer Workers 100-250 and Warriors 100-250.

itemEum.name: Senior Battalion
itemEum.desc: Offer Scouts 200-250, Pikemen 200-300, Swordsmen 150-250 and Archers 100-200.

itemEum.name: Veteran Battalion
itemEum.desc: Offer Cavalry 100-300, Cataphracts 100-200 and Transporters 200-450.

itemEum.name: Mechanics Battalion
itemEum.desc: Offer Ballistae 100-400, Battering Rams 100-250 and Catapults 150-350.

itemEum.name: Wooden Chest
itemEum.desc: Acquires one item randomly once opened.
itemEum.itemDesc: Wood-made chest, be gained in plunder or conquer valleys. One item offered randomly if opened.

itemEum.name: Builder's Tools
itemEum.desc: Masons and builders in the middle ages constructed palaces, walls and cathedrals with little besides a hammer, chisel and a dream.
itemEum.itemDesc: Gundalf’s Compass (125 Cent value), to let you build twice as much for 2 days!

itemEum.name: Candy Corn
itemEum.desc: Your troops will consume no food for 24 hours. Stacks up to 5 times.
itemEum.itemDesc: This yummy candy will satisfy the appetite of your troops. That is strange, because it has absolutely no nutritional value!

itemEum.name: Candy Corn
itemEum.desc: Using this item will grant you 50% free upkeep during the Halloween 2013 promotion!
itemEum.itemDesc: Trick or treat, candy time!

itemEum.name: Chocolate Bunny
itemEum.desc: Happy Easter! This tasty bunny will help you bring home more troops on your next attack.
itemEum.itemDesc: Using this item will increase your heal rate by 10% for the next attack sent.

itemEum.name: Christmas Gift
itemEum.desc: Opening this gift will give you the following benefits:+15% to Heal for 24 hours,+25% to Resource Production for 24 hours,10% Speed to Recruiting queue for 24 hours.
itemEum.itemDesc: Merry Christmas from the Evony team! Hope you have a happy holidays and a wonderful New Year!

itemEum.name: Cupid's Chocolates
itemEum.desc: A gift from your friends during Valentine's Day. Use it to get a 24 hours 50% upkeep buff in ALL your cities from Feb 12th to Feb 16th. Cupid's Chocolates are stackable (meaning if you already have this buff, using it again will add a further 24 hours). Once Feb 17th comes though, this buff will expire if you haven't used it yet.
itemEum.itemDesc: Get a 24 hours 50% upkeep buff during Feb 12th and Feb 16th.

itemEum.name: Cupid’s Chocolates
itemEum.desc: Get a 24 hours 100% free upkeep buff during Feb 06th 2013 and Feb 17th 2013.
itemEum.itemDesc: When used, Cupid’s Chocolates will grant 24 hours of zero upkeep. This item can be stacked, and will expire after maintenance on the 17th of February, 2013.

itemEum.name: Corselet
itemEum.desc: Increase Defence of troops by 20%. Effective for 24 hours.
itemEum.itemDesc: Made of special material, this armor can resist certain strike of rival. Defence of soldiers increased once they put on this armor.

itemEum.name: Ultra Corselet
itemEum.desc: Increase Defence of troops by 20%. Effective for 7 days.
itemEum.itemDesc: Made of high-grade sturdy material, this Armor can resist certain strike of rival. Defence of soldiers increased once they put on this armor.

itemEum.name: Dynamite
itemEum.desc: Demolish building immediately. But acquire no resource.
itemEum.itemDesc: Gunpowder was introduced to Europe by Macro Polo from China. Beside it was used in wars, also it was used to demolish building. Buildings destructed by Dynamite leaves no resource to you. Meanwhile, it can't be applied to Town Hall.

itemEum.name: Easter Egg
itemEum.desc: A gift from your friends at Easter. Use it to get 24 hours of 50% upkeep in ALL your cities any time from April 23rd through April 29th. Easter Eggs are stackable (meaning if you already have this buff, using it again will add an additional 24 hours). Once April 30th comes, this item will expire.
itemEum.itemDesc: Get a 24 hours 50% upkeep buff during April 23rd and April 30th.

itemEum.name: Easter Key
itemEum.desc: This golden key seems heavier than it should be. Looking closer you see it’s a massive foil covered chocolate key!
itemEum.itemDesc: key will open the 2013 Easter promotional chest.

itemEum.name: Marshmallow Meep
itemEum.desc: This delicious treat reduces food your troops consume by 50% for 24 hours. Expires April 15th.
itemEum.itemDesc: This delicious treat reduces food your troops consume by 50% for 24 hours. Expires April 15th.

itemEum.name: Emperor’s Hallmark
itemEum.desc: The greatest lords wear only the best armor. Painstakingly crafted by master smiths, these accessories and armor are fit for the ruler of a mighty empire.
itemEum.itemDesc: includes Holy Helm of Mars, Excalibur, Ultra Corselet, Ivory Horn, Mechanic Battalion, Vesta’s Blessing, War Teleporter x3, War Ensign x3 and Penicillin.

itemEum.name: Evoween Treats Bag
itemEum.desc: You will receive a random item among Resources,Speaker, Beginner Guidelines, Amulet, City teleport, 10 coins, Haunted Castle
itemEum.itemDesc: Exchanged with 10 pieces of Evoween Treats. Once opened will provide you with an item randomly.

itemEum.name: Evoween Treats
itemEum.desc: Includes: Resources, Excalibur, Ultra Corselet , Penicillin, War Ensign, Haunted Castle ,Amulet, War teleport, Adv. City Teleport , 10 coins
itemEum.itemDesc: The Evoween Treats are exchanged with 1 candy. Once opened will provide you with an item randomly.

itemEum.name: Anabasis
itemEum.desc: Increase hero's experience by 1,000 or 8% of current level cap (whichever's greater).
itemEum.itemDesc: Anabasis is wrote by ancient Greek writer Xenophone.Anabasis is one of the first unabridged texts studied by students of classical Greek due to its clear and unadorned style. This item used to increase hero's Experience slightly.

itemEum.name: Epitome of Military Science
itemEum.desc: Increase hero's experience by 10,000 or 30% of current level cap (whichever's greater).
itemEum.itemDesc: Epitome of Military Science, written by ancient Roman wirter Vegetius. Vegetius's epitome mainly focuses on military organization and how to react to certain occasions in war. This item used to increase hero's Experience considerably.

itemEum.name: On War
itemEum.desc: Increase hero's experience by 100,000 or 100% of current level cap (whichever's greater).
itemEum.itemDesc: Carl von Clausewitz was a Prussian strategist. His masterpiece On War is listed amongst military classic works. This item used to increase hero's Experience massively.

itemEum.name: Archimedes' Note
itemEum.desc: Shorten the remaining time of construction of Fortified units by 30%. Limit to one application for each construction in queue.
itemEum.itemDesc: Archimedes was a Greek mathematician, physicist, engineer, inventor, and astronomer. He is credited with designing innovative machines, including siege engines and the screw pump that bears his name. Designs of different machinery recorded on this note are definitely beneficial to your fortification.

itemEum.name: Tax Policy
itemEum.desc: Increase Tax Revenue by 100%. Effective for 24 hours.
itemEum.itemDesc: Right tax policy in right time would increase your tax income in a short time without bothering your people.

itemEum.name: Adv Tax Policy
itemEum.desc: Increase Tax Revenue by 100%. Effective for 7 days.
itemEum.itemDesc: Right tax policy in right time would increase your tax income in a short time without bothering your people.

itemEum.name: Halloween Candy
itemEum.desc: A gift from your friends during Halloween.Use it to get a 24 hours 50% upkeep buff from Oct 29th to Nov 2nd. Halloween Candy is stackable (meaning if you already have this buff, using it again will add a further 24 hours). Once Nov 3rd comes though, this buff will expire if you haven't used it yet.
itemEum.itemDesc: Get a 24 hours 50% upkeep buff during Oct 29th and Nov 2nd.

itemEum.name: Haunted Castle
itemEum.desc: This item will change the look of your city and make them stand out on the game map. Once applied, your city will receive a 10% bonus on all resources production, and increase rally spot troops limit by 25%.
itemEum.itemDesc: Effective for one single city. This item can be used at any time and effective for 15 days.

itemEum.name: Haunted Castle Adv
itemEum.desc: This item will change the look of your city and make them stand out on the game map. Once applied, your city will receive a 10% bonus on all resources production, and increase rally spot troops limit by 25%.
itemEum.itemDesc: Effective for all cities. This item can be used at any time and effective for 15 days.

itemEum.name: Christmas Castle
itemEum.desc: Using the Christmas Castle item will give your city a christmas theme for 15 days. During this time you will also have the additional benefit of 10% bonus on all resource production, and a 25% increase in the amount of troops your rally spot can send.
itemEum.itemDesc: Ho Ho Ho and man the battlements! The Christmas Castle will bring yuletide cheer to your city, and pain to your enemies.

itemEum.name: Christmas Castle Adv
itemEum.desc: Using the Christmas Castle Adv item will give all of your cities a Christmas theme for 15 days. During this time you will also have the additional benefit of 10% bonus on all resource production, and a 25% increase in the amount of troops your rally spot can send in each city.
itemEum.itemDesc: Ho Ho Ho and man the battlements! This Christmas Castle Adv will bring yuletide cheer to all of your cities, and pain to your many enemies.

itemEum.name: Speech Text
itemEum.desc: Instantly increase Loyalty to 100 and decrease Public Grievance to 0.
itemEum.itemDesc: Public Speech can be a powerful tool to use for purposes such as motivation, influence, persuasion, informing, or simply entertaining. Loyalty of your people has reached bottom. You need to do something about. A fabulous speech will dramatically ease this situation.

itemEum.name: Irish Stew
itemEum.desc: A gift from your friends around St Patrick's Day. Use it to get 24 hours of 50% upkeep in ALL your cities any time from March 17th through March 21st. Irish Stew is stackable (meaning if you already have this buff, using it again will add an additional 24 hours). Once March 22th comes, this item will expire if you haven't used it yet.
itemEum.itemDesc: Get a 24 hours 50% upkeep buff during Mar 17th and Mar 21st.

itemEum.name: A Feast for the People
itemEum.desc: This gift from the local merchants promises that they will feed your troops and people for a short period as a thank you for being a repeat customer.
itemEum.itemDesc: When used during the 2013 Queen's Feast promotion, this item will provide you with a 50% reduction in upkeep for 24 hours. Using multiple items will increase the timer. The timer will end at the end of the day on December 5th.

itemEum.name: Birthday Cake
itemEum.desc: Happy birthday! Cake for you and for your troops!.
itemEum.itemDesc: When used your troops will need 50% less upkeep for 24 hours..

itemEum.name: Evoween Treats
itemEum.desc: Trick or treating always works better when you do it with 10,000 archers at your back!
itemEum.itemDesc: Collect 10 Evoween Treats and get a prize! You have a chance to win these any time you attack any player or barbarian city.

itemEum.name: Candy
itemEum.desc: Can be turned in to exchange for Evoween Treats
itemEum.itemDesc: One of the hallmarks of Halloween is trick or treating, where kids go out on a grand hunt for candy.

itemEum.name: Chest of Hunt
itemEum.desc: Emblazoned with the symbols of the Wild Hunt, this chest promises a boon to any who open it.
itemEum.itemDesc: Opening the Chest of the Hunt will give the player one of the following, randomly:Grand Boom of Llewellyn,Huntmaster’s Share,Huntsman’s Prized Trophy,The Gilded Hide,Tools of the Hunt

itemEum.name: Christmas Gift 2013
itemEum.desc: Merry Christmas from the Evony team! Hope you have a happy holidays and a wonderful New Year!
itemEum.itemDesc: Opening this gift will give you the following items:5x War Ensign,1x City Teleporter,1x Excalibur,5x Coin of the Hunt

itemEum.name: Coin of the Hunt
itemEum.desc: This rare and precious coin will bestow luck in battle upon its bearer during the Hunt of the Snowbound.
itemEum.itemDesc: Using this item will grant you entry into the Snowbound Hunt competition. Each item used will grant you 1 hour of the “Coin of the Hunt”. During this hour you will be able to gain Hunter’s Stones from successful attacks against your neighbors.

itemEum.name: Grand Snowbound Huntmaster
itemEum.desc: Congratulations! You are the Grand Snowbound Huntmaster of the Snowbound Hunt. This is your reward.
itemEum.itemDesc: Using this item from the Snowbound Hunt will give you:2,500 cents,1 x Ardee's Sigil of Recruitment,1x Warmonger's Package

itemEum.name: Assistant of the Hunt
itemEum.desc: Congratulations! You are the Assistant of the Hunt of the Snowbound Hunt. This is your reward.
itemEum.itemDesc: Using this item from the Snowbound Hunt will give you:1x Warmonger's Package

itemEum.name: Snowbound Jaegermeister
itemEum.desc: Congratulations! You are the Snowbound Jaegermeister of the Snowbound Hunt. This is your reward.
itemEum.itemDesc: Using this item from the Snowbound Hunt will give you:1,500 cents,1 x Ardee's Sigil of Recruitment,1x Warmonger's Package

itemEum.name: Burning Huntsman
itemEum.desc: Congratulations! You are the Burning Huntsman of the Snowbound Hunt. This is your reward.
itemEum.itemDesc: Using this item from the Snowbound Hunt will give you:800 cents,1 x Ardee's Sigil of Recruitment,1x Warmonger's Package

itemEum.name: Hunter of the Avalanche
itemEum.desc: Congratulations! You are the Hunter of the Avalanche of the Snowbound Hunt. This is your reward.
itemEum.itemDesc: Using this item from the Snowbound Hunt will give you:600 cents,1 x Ardee's Sigil of Recruitment,1x Warmonger's Package

itemEum.name: Hunter of the Blizzard
itemEum.desc: Congratulations! You are the Hunter of the Blizzard of the Snowbound Hunt. This is your reward.
itemEum.itemDesc: Using this item from the Snowbound Hunt will give you:400 cents,1 x Ardee's Sigil of Recruitment,1x Warmonger's Package

itemEum.name: Jager of the Snowbound
itemEum.desc: Congratulations! You are the Jager of the Snowbound of the Snowbound Hunt. This is your reward.
itemEum.itemDesc: Using this item from the Snowbound Hunt will give you:150 cents,1x Warmonger's Package

itemEum.name: Crested Trunk
itemEum.desc: This trunk was brought to you as a gift from one of you allies. It is emblazoned with the crest of the Emperor, and has obviously come from the site where the Emperor’s army was routed.
itemEum.itemDesc: Opening the Crested Trunk will give the player one of the following, randomly:The Spoils of the Victor,Quartermaster’s Trunk,The Scout’s Supplies,Cache of the Fells,Chest of the Dogs

itemEum.name: Crest of the Hunt
itemEum.desc: You have received a package with a crest on the outside, the ancient crest of the hunt. Open the package and see what you were given.
itemEum.itemDesc: Open this package to see what prize you have received for collecting enough wolf paws..

itemEum.name: Evonytoberfest War Package
itemEum.desc: These packages are delivered as gifts to players for every $30 worth of purchases made during our Evonytoberfest promotion.
itemEum.itemDesc: Includes:The Evonytoberfest War Package contains:3x Random Medals,2 x Primary Guidelines,1 x War Horn,1 x Corselet,1 x Fleet Feet,1 x Endurance of the Immortals,1 x Truce Agreement,5 x Amulet,1 x War Teleporter,1 x Saxony Chest Key

itemEum.name: Chest of the Ovo Renovatur
itemEum.desc: Opening the Chest of the Ovo Renovatur will grant you one random prize.
itemEum.itemDesc: The order is pleased to grant you a gift for finding this trinket. Enjoy the coming of spring!

itemEum.name: Gift of the Wise Mystics
itemEum.desc: Opening the Gift of the Wise Mystics will grant you one random prize from the 2013 Yuletide Promotion
itemEum.itemDesc: The wise mystics have given you this price in return for the relic of the Krampus that you have recovered.

itemEum.name: Gilded Horn
itemEum.desc: This gilded horn was requested by some merchant caravans that have recently reached your city. Gather 1 of these items to trade with the merchants.
itemEum.itemDesc: This gilded horn was requested by some merchant caravans that have recently reached your city. Gather 1 of these items to trade with the merchants.

itemEum.name: Harvest Token
itemEum.desc: Across the countryside these tokens have been placed, and the local lords are offering rewards in exchange for anyone recovering one.
itemEum.itemDesc: Across the countryside these tokens have been placed, and the local lords are offering rewards in exchange for anyone recovering one.

itemEum.name: Hunter’s Stones
itemEum.desc: You've earned these stones from successful attacks during the The Snowbound Hunt.
itemEum.itemDesc: You've earned these stones from successful attacks during the The Snowbound Hunt.

itemEum.name: The Huntsman's Satchel
itemEum.desc: The Huntsman’s Satchel is covered with runes of power to hide your steps and enhance your sight as you hunt animal or man. It is filled to the brim with tools and boons to ensure your success.
itemEum.itemDesc: Includes:2 x Adv Teleporter,1 x War Teleporter,3 x War Ensign,1 x War Horn,1 x Excalibur,1 x Corselet,1 x Bone Key

itemEum.name: Imperial Order
itemEum.desc: Troops eat less when under threat of death.
itemEum.itemDesc: This order will reduce troop upkeep by 50% for 24 hours. Multiple Imperial Orders will increase the duration. Buff expires March 24th.

itemEum.name: Love Song
itemEum.desc: If music be the food of love, play on.
itemEum.itemDesc: Upon use, your enraptured troops will eat 50% less food for 24 hours. Stacks up to 5 times.

itemEum.name: Merchant’s Package
itemEum.desc: You have received an oddly shaped but altogether non-descript package from a merchant in the caravan.
itemEum.itemDesc: Open this package to see what prize you have received for collecting the requested Gilded Horns.

itemEum.name: Piece of Rainbow
itemEum.desc: A fragment of a shattered rainbow. If you had a few more pieces, you could reconstruct the path to riches!
itemEum.itemDesc: Collect 10 Piece of Rainbow to turn in for the Treasure Hunt quest.

itemEum.name: Shake Spear
itemEum.desc: This unsteady spear is not much good for hunting. Perhaps someone will accept it in trade.
itemEum.itemDesc: A spear of great renown.

itemEum.name: Trinket of the Order
itemEum.itemDesc: You’ve found a trinket of the Ovo Renovatur order! As a celebration of the rebirth of nature, the order will give you a gift for finding it!

itemEum.name: Relic of the Krampus
itemEum.desc: This is a relic of the Krampus, found in the darkness of winter, it holds a chill that can’t be explained by nature. These relics can be traded for items of value.
itemEum.itemDesc: One can gather a maximum of 6 Relic of the Krampus per day.

itemEum.name: Saxon Beer Chest
itemEum.desc: These chests are sent to you as Saxon Beer gifts from your friends in the game. They require a Saxony Chest Key to open. You can obtain a Saxony Chest Key for every $30 worth of purchases made during this promotion. When opened, you will receive the contents of Saxon Beer Chest A, B, C, D, or E at random.
itemEum.itemDesc: Opening the Saxon Beer Chest will give the player one of the following, randomly:Saxon’s Boot of Refreshment,The Friar’s Stout Barrel,Brewmaster’s Best Firkin,Dragonstooth Firkin,The Harvester’s Pin

itemEum.name: Sinterklaas’s Cookies
itemEum.desc: A plate of cookies for enjoyment in the middle of the night while awaiting Sinterklaas.
itemEum.itemDesc: When used you will receive a 50% bonus to upkeep for 24 hours. This item is stackable, and will be usable between December 20th, 2013 and January 7th, 2014. Once Jan 8th comes though, this buff will expire if you haven't used it yet.

itemEum.name: Snowball
itemEum.desc: Collect 10 Snowballs to turn in for the Snowball Fight quest.
itemEum.itemDesc: You've found a snowball! Collect them so you're always ready for a snowball fight!

itemEum.name: Supplies of the Emperor
itemEum.desc: Following a total defeat, the Emperor’s troops withdrew in such disarray that many of their supplies were left behind. Your soldiers have brought you a large collection of the Emperor’s lost equipment.
itemEum.itemDesc: Includes:2 x Adv Teleporter,1 x War Teleporter,3 x War Ensign,1 x War Horn,1 x Excalibur,1 x Ultra Corselet

itemEum.name: Talisman of the Sated
itemEum.desc: The Talisman of the Sated will provide your troops with energy and happiness, resulting in them needing 50% less food for upkeep.
itemEum.itemDesc: When used your troops will need 50% less upkeep for 24 hours.

itemEum.name: The Noble Harvest Reward
itemEum.desc: Opening the Noble Harvest Reward will grant you one random prize from the 2013 Queen's Feast Promotion
itemEum.itemDesc: The nobility in your lands have created this reward as a bounty for finding a Harvest Token

itemEum.name: Turkey Feather
itemEum.desc: You’ve found some turkey feather! Gather enough and you can capture a turkey for dinner!
itemEum.itemDesc: Collect 10 Turkey Feather to turn in for the Turkey Hunt quest.

itemEum.name: Warmonger’s Pack
itemEum.desc: The Warmonger’s Pack is an exclusive pack available to players who have finished in a top slot on their server in the contest.
itemEum.itemDesc: The Warmonger’s Pack includes the following:10 x War Ensign,3 x Fleet Feet,2 x Endurance of the Immortals,2 x Broken Gates,1 x Opportunist’s Plague,1 x Poisoned Feast,1 x Dream Truce

itemEum.name: Wolf's Paw
itemEum.desc: This wolf paw totem was found in the ruins of your most recent raid. Barbarians have been trading them recently, and may barter with you.
itemEum.itemDesc: This wolf paw totem was found in the ruins of your most recent raid. Barbarians have been trading them recently, and may barter with you.

itemEum.name: Itish Stew
itemEum.desc: The famous Irish Stew is both tasty and hearty. Eat this and you won’t be hungry for hours!
itemEum.itemDesc: A gift from your friends during the St Patrick’s Day 2013 promotion. Use it to get 24 hours of 50% upkeep in ALL your cities any time from March 14th through March 19th. Irish Stew is stackable for the period of the promotion. Once maintenance on March 20th comes, this item and its timers will expire.

itemEum.name: Bearded Key of the Harvest
itemEum.desc: This key is decorated by a trophy turkey beard. It open a similarly adorned lock from this year’s Harvest.
itemEum.itemDesc: Using this item will open a Chest from the 2013 Queen's Feast Promotion.

itemEum.name: Birthday Key
itemEum.desc: This key fits the 5th Anniversary Chest.
itemEum.itemDesc: This key is used to open the 5th Anniversary Chest.

itemEum.name: Wooden Bull Opener
itemEum.desc: You can use this key to open one Hollow Wooden Bull sent to you by your friends. If you don’t have any Hollow Wooden Bull, you should ask your friends to send you some!
itemEum.itemDesc: You can open any Hollow Wooden Bull your friends gave you with this key once.

itemEum.name: Casanova’s Key
itemEum.desc: Casanova’s key will open the chests received during the Valentine’s Day promotion.
itemEum.itemDesc: Casanova’s key will help you get into the most jealously guarded treasures found in the land.

itemEum.name: Special Easter Chest Key
itemEum.desc: You can use this key to open one Special Easter Chest sent to you by your friends. If you don’t have any Special Easter Chests, you should ask your friends to send you some!
itemEum.itemDesc: You can open any Special Easter Chest your friends gave you with this key once.

itemEum.name: Easter Key
itemEum.desc: This key fits the 2014 Easter chest, the Gift of the Ovo Renovatur.
itemEum.itemDesc: This key is used to open the Gift of the Ovo Renovatur.

itemEum.name: Special Easter Chest Key
itemEum.desc: You can open one Special Easter Chest your friends gave you with this key. You can get Chest A (Freedom Medal, Justice Medal, Nation Medal, Michelangelo's Script, Plowshares, Arch Saw, Quarrying Tools, Blower, War Ensign, Excalibur, The Wealth of Nations, Amulet) or Chest B (Primary Guidelines, Intermediate Guidelines, Hero Hunting, Merchant Fleet, Plowshares, Double Saw, Quarrying Tools, Blower, Michelangelo's Script, Tax Policy, The Wealth of Nations) or Chest C (Excalibur, War Horn, Corselect
itemEum.itemDesc: You can open one Special Easter Chest your friends gave you with this key.

itemEum.name: Key of Lilies
itemEum.desc: This key opens one Evony Easter Chest
itemEum.itemDesc: A shining key, wrapped in the stems of beautiful Easter Lilies

itemEum.name: Gingerbread Key
itemEum.desc: Use this key to open a gift exchange chest from the Christmas 2012 promotion.
itemEum.itemDesc: This key is made from freshly baked gingerbread. It looks like it opens the lock to the Christmas Chests.

itemEum.name: Skeleton Key
itemEum.desc: You can use this key to open one Locked Halloween Chest sent to you by your friends. If you don’t have any Locked Halloween Chest, you should ask your friends to send you some!
itemEum.itemDesc: You can use this key to open one Locked Halloween Chest sent to you by your friends. If you don’t have any Locked Halloween Chest, you should ask your friends to send you some!

itemEum.name: Skeleton Key
itemEum.desc: The skeleton key you liberated from the Baba Yaga will let you open any skeletal lock, but only once before it breaks.
itemEum.itemDesc: The Skeleton Key will allow you to open one chest from the Halloween 2012 promotion.

itemEum.name: Skeleton Key
itemEum.desc: The skeleton key you liberated from the Baba Yaga will let you open any skeletal lock, but only once before it breaks.
itemEum.itemDesc: The Skeleton Key will allow you to open one chest from the Halloween 2013 promotion.

itemEum.name: Key of Crossing
itemEum.desc: Warning: May trigger civil war and/or the fall of the Republic.
itemEum.itemDesc: Opens one Rubicon Chest. Rubicon Chests are given by friends and alliance members when they make a $30 purchase.

itemEum.desc: You can use this key to open ANY chest in your Items inventory. The Silver Key is very fragile, and can only be used to open one chest before it breaks, so choose wisely!

itemEum.itemDesc: Light passing through this key takes on a rich green glow.

itemEum.name: Star-Crossed Key
itemEum.desc: From forth the fatal loins of these two foes.
itemEum.itemDesc: Opens Romi’s Dagger Chest, if you dare!.

itemEum.desc: You can use this key to open one Summer of Gold Chest.

itemEum.itemDesc: You can use this key to open one Valentine's Day Chest sent to you by your friends. If you don’t have any Valentine’s Day Chests, you should ask your friends to send you some!

itemEum.name: Key of the Imperator
itemEum.desc: This key holds the Emperor’s seal, and should any chests found abandoned in their rout.
itemEum.itemDesc: The Key of the Imperator Key will open the Crested Trunk from the 2013 Rout of the Emperor promotion.

itemEum.name: Knight's Gear
itemEum.desc: All the weapons and armor a Knight needs to plunge into battle and bring honor to his Queen and his alliance.
itemEum.itemDesc: Includes Excalibur, Corselet, War Horn, and War Ensign.

itemEum.name: Leaf of the Tree
itemEum.desc: A leaf from the tree of Liberty, it will refresh your troops and help more of them return to the heat of battle.
itemEum.itemDesc: This item when used will give you a 10% heal for the next 24 hours.

itemEum.name: Milk and Cookies
itemEum.desc: Get a 24 hours 50% upkeep buff during Dec 21st 2012 and Jan 3rd 2013.
itemEum.itemDesc: A gift from your friends during the Christmas 2012 promotion. Use this to receive 50% off upkeep in all of your cities for 24 hours! This item is stackable, and will be usable between January 21st, 2012 and January 3rd, 2013. Once Jan 4th comes though, this buff will expire if you haven't used it yet.

itemEum.name: Adv City Teleporter
itemEum.desc: Teleport your city to a specific location.
itemEum.itemDesc: Any troops sent or garrison troops in your city is not allowed while teleporting. A city can only use the Adv. City Teleporter once every 12 hours and share cooldown with War Teleporter.

itemEum.name: War Teleporter
itemEum.desc: Teleport your city to a barbarian city.
itemEum.itemDesc: Any troops sent or garrison troops in your city is not allowed while teleporting. A city can only use the War Teleporter once every 12 hours and share cooldown with Adv. City Teleporter.

itemEum.name: Pioneer Express Teleport
itemEum.desc: This special free advanced teleporter dispapears after 7 days. Truce status will end 48 hours after using this teleporter.
itemEum.itemDesc: This special free advanced teleporter dispapears after 7 days. Truce status will end 48 hours after using this teleporter.

itemEum.name: New ID
itemEum.desc: Change Lord Name in game.
itemEum.itemDesc: New ID enables player to change the name of lord in game. By clicking the lord head icon and select Change button behind Lord bar. Change it and click Confirm.

itemEum.name: New Year's Eve Party Spirit
itemEum.desc: A gift from your friends during New Year.Use it to get a 24 hours no upkeep buff during Jan 1st and Jan 3rd.It can not be used at other time.All buffs and all unused New Year's Eve Party Spirit items will be removed when Jan 4th comes.Could at most have THREE DAYS ZERO UPKEEP by using three such items.
itemEum.itemDesc: Get a 24 hours no upkeep buff during Jan 1st and Jan 3rd.

itemEum.name: Truce Agreement
itemEum.desc: Once applied, your city will have 12 hours peacetime. In this period, you can't neither perform attack nor be attacked by others. If troops marching to your city or you have despatched troops, you can't use this item.
itemEum.itemDesc: In ancient war time, some countries, for the purpose of peace, would sent out envoys to negotiate with neighboring states. If peace agreement reached, they will have a safe and stable living atmosphere for its development. This is the most effective way that survive this chaotic world.

itemEum.name: Civil Code
itemEum.desc: Instantly add 20% of the Population Limit (or 100, whichever's greater) to the Current Population. Does not work if the Current Population reaches the Population Limit.
itemEum.itemDesc: A civil code is a systematic compilation of laws designed to comprehensively deal with the core areas of private law. A jurisdiction that has a civil code generally also has a code of civil procedure. In some jurisdictions with a civil code, a number of the core areas of private law that would otherwise typically be codified in a civil code may instead be codified in a commercial code.

itemEum.name: Pot o' Gold
itemEum.desc: The legends were true. There really is a pot of gold at the end of the rainbow!
itemEum.itemDesc: Opening the Pot o’ Gold will grant you one of the Treasure Hunt prizes, randomly.

itemEum.name: Bernini's Hammer
itemEum.desc: Allows the queuing of 1 or more buildings for construction per Title, up to a maximum of 10. For example, Barons may queue up to 4 buildings for construcion. Each building added to the queue consumes 1 Bernini's Hammer.
itemEum.itemDesc: Gian Lorenzo Bernini was an Italian artist, sculptor, playwright and architect. Working mainly in Rome, he was a successor to Michelangelo. Bernini was able to secure the most important commission of his day: work on the Piazza San Pietro in front of St. Peter's Basilica in Rome. The origins of this stonemason's hammer are indisputable. It is lighter and stronger than similar tools and bears an almost mystical energy that allows even an apprentice to work more efficiently than a master craftsman.

itemEum.name: Gundulf's Compass
itemEum.desc: Gives 72 hours of double building time.
itemEum.itemDesc: Gives an extra build slot in the building queue for 72 hours. This will allow you to ready the next project for construction.

itemEum.name: Vesta's Blessing
itemEum.desc: Reduce troops upkeep by 50%, lasts for 24 hours.
itemEum.itemDesc: Vesta, the sister of Zeus, was the Goddess of the hearth in Greek mythology. With her blessing, we can produce much more food with the limited resource.

itemEum.name: Penicillin
itemEum.desc: Decrease personnel loss up by 30% during battles. Effective for 7 days.
itemEum.itemDesc: The application of penicillin to war medic greatly decreases the casualties in war field. Immediate medical treatment enables them survive the battles.

itemEum.name: Plowshares
itemEum.desc: Increase production of food by 25%. Effective for 24 hours.
itemEum.itemDesc: Plowshare is used to turn over soil to plant seeds. This was a metal agricultural equipment used in the worldwide. This bronze-made tool has greatly improve agricultural production.

itemEum.name: Iron Rake
itemEum.desc: Increase production of food 25%. Effective for 7 days.
itemEum.itemDesc: Plowshare is used to turn over soil to plant seeds. This was a metal agricultural equipment used in the worldwide. The evolution from plowshares to iron rake has given a great plus to agricultural production.

itemEum.name: Arch Saw
itemEum.desc: Increase production of lumber by 25%. Effective for 24 hours.
itemEum.itemDesc: Saw, which said to be invented by Chinese craftsman Lu Ban. With the development of material and design, saw has been greatly improved. Metal saw became a commonplace in lumbering. The employment of saw has enhanced lumber production significantly.

itemEum.name: Double Saw
itemEum.desc: Increase production of lumber by 25%. Effective for 7 days.
itemEum.itemDesc: In the process of lumbering, some trees are too big to saw. Single-handled saw is not suitable for these trees. People began to design a longer saw which held by two ends with two men. This double saw widen the sawing range in lumbering, and contribute a lot to lumber output.

itemEum.name: Quarrying Tools
itemEum.desc: Increase production of stone by 25%. Effective for 24 hours.
itemEum.itemDesc: Town construction demands huge sum of stone. Raw stone is buried under soil which making quarrying a hard work. People starts to use lever, ropes and logs to deliver stone. The employment of these equipment increases stone production enormously.

itemEum.name: Adv Quarrying Tools
itemEum.desc: Increase production of stone by 25%. Effective for 7 days.
itemEum.itemDesc: Heavy as stone is, the exploitation is very dangerous to workers. Some tools are used to reduce this risk. Lever, pulley, wheel and axes are employed into quarrying, which increase stone production in considerable scale.

itemEum.name: Blower
itemEum.desc: Increase production of iron by 25%. Effective for 24 hours.
itemEum.itemDesc: Soon after the use of bronze, metal casting became a critical technology to military maintenance. The invention of blower making extracting metal out of ore much easier in furnace.

itemEum.name: Blast Furnace
itemEum.desc: Increase production of iron by 25%. Effective for 7 days.
itemEum.itemDesc: A blast furnace is a type of metallurgical furnace used for smelting to produce metals, generally iron. In a blast furnace, fuel and ore are continuously supplied through the top of the furnace, while air is blown into the bottom of the chamber, so that the chemical reactions take place throughout the furnace as the material moves downward.

itemEum.name: Food Package
itemEum.desc: Includes: Food 250000
itemEum.itemDesc: This package including resources.

itemEum.name: Gold Package
itemEum.desc: Includes: Gold 250000
itemEum.itemDesc: This package including resources.

itemEum.name: Iron Package
itemEum.desc: Includes: Iron 250000
itemEum.itemDesc: This package including resources.

itemEum.name: Stone Package
itemEum.desc: Includes: Stone 250000
itemEum.itemDesc: This package including resources.

itemEum.name: Wood Package
itemEum.desc: Includes: Wood 250000
itemEum.itemDesc: This package including resources.

itemEum.name: Extra-Fast Running Shoes
itemEum.desc: A gift from your friends around Run with the Bulls. Use it to get 24 hours of 50% upkeep in ALL your cities any time from July 9th through July 13th. Extra-Fast Running Shoes is stackable (meaning if you already have this buff, using it again will add an additional 24 hours). Once July 14th comes, this item will expire if you haven't used it yet.
itemEum.itemDesc: Get a 24 hours 50% upkeep buff during July 9th and July 13th.

itemEum.name: Santa's Milk and Cookies
itemEum.desc: A gift from your friends during Christmas. Use it to get a 24 hours NO upkeep buff in ALL your cities from Dec 15th to Jan 4th. Santa’s Milk and Cookies is stackable (meaning if you already have this buff, using it again will add a further 24 hours). Once Jan 5th comes though, this buff will expire if you haven't used it yet.
itemEum.itemDesc: Get a 24 hours NO upkeep buff during Dec 15th and Jan 4th.

itemEum.name: Milk and Cookies
itemEum.desc: A gift from your friends during Christmas. Use it to get a 24 hours NO upkeep buff in ALL your cities from Dec 19th to Jan 6th 2012. Milk and Cookies is stackable (meaning if you already have this buff, using it again will add a further 24 hours). Once Jan 7th comes though, this buff will expire if you haven't used it yet.
itemEum.itemDesc: You can only use this item between Mon Dec 19th 00:00:00 CST 2011 and Sat Jan 7th st 00:00:00 CST 2012.

itemEum.name: Valentine's Candies
itemEum.desc: A gift from your friends during Valentine's Day.Use it to get a 24 hours No upkeep buff in All your cities from Feb 9th to Feb 22nd. Valentine's Candy is stackable(meaning if you already have this buff,using it again will add a further 24 hours). Once Feb 23nd comes though,this buff will expire if you haven't used it yet.
itemEum.itemDesc: You can only use this item between Thur.Feb 9th 00:00:00 CST 2012 and Fri.Feb 23rd 00:00:00 CST 2012

itemEum.name: Saxony Chest Key
itemEum.desc: You can use this key to open one Saxon Beer Chest sent to you by your friends. If you don’t have any Saxon Beer Chests, you should ask your friends to send you some!
itemEum.itemDesc: You can use this key to open one Saxon Beer Chest sent to you by your friends. If you don’t have any Saxon Beer Chests, you should ask your friends to send you some!

itemEum.name: Snowball Pile
itemEum.desc: Opening the Snowball Pile will grant you one of the Snowball Fight prizes, randomly.
itemEum.itemDesc: A bunch of snowballs piled on top of something shiny, you could move them and see what it is

itemEum.name: Bronze Publicity Ambassador (Permanent)
itemEum.desc: Effect of Bronze Publicity Ambassador (Permanent) can only be replaced by Silver Publicity Ambassador (Permanent) or Gold Publicity Ambassador (Permanent).
itemEum.itemDesc: Once you apply this item, a special bronze icon will be displayed in front of your name when you speak in the chat box. While this item functions permanently, multiple applications make no difference to the duration of the effective period. Its effect can be replaced by Silver Publicity Ambassador (Permanent) or Gold Publicity Ambassador (Permanent).

itemEum.name: Bronze Publicity Ambassador (15-day)
itemEum.desc: Once you apply this item, a special bronze icon will be displayed in front of your name when you speak in the chat box. It’s effective for 15 days, while multiple applications can lengthen the effective period. Its effect can be replaced by Bronze Publicity Ambassador (Permanent), Silver Publicity Ambassador (15-day), Silver Publicity Ambassador (Permanent), Gold Publicity Ambassador (15-day) or Gold Publicity Ambassador (Permanent).
itemEum.itemDesc: Once you apply this item, a special bronze icon will be displayed in front of your name when you speak in the chat box. It’s effective for 15 days, while multiple applications can lengthen the effective period. Its effect can be replaced by Bronze Publicity Ambassador (Permanent), Silver Publicity Ambassador (15-day), Silver Publicity Ambassador (Permanent), Gold Publicity Ambassador (15-day) or Gold Publicity Ambassador (Permanent).

itemEum.name: Gold Publicity Ambassador (15-day)
itemEum.desc: Once you apply this item, a special gold icon will be displayed in front of your name when you speak in the chat box. It’s effective for 15 days, while multiple applications can lengthen the effective period. Its effect can be replaced by Gold Publicity Ambassador (Permanent).
itemEum.itemDesc: Effect of Gold Publicity Ambassador (15-day) can only be replaced by Gold Publicity Ambassador (Permanent).

itemEum.name: Gold Publicity Ambassador (Permanent)
itemEum.desc: Once you apply this item, a special gold icon will be displayed in front of your name when you speak in the chat box. While this item functions permanently, multiple applications make no difference to the duration of the effective period.
itemEum.itemDesc: You're the highest level Publicity Ambassador now.

itemEum.name: Silver Publicity Ambassador (15-day)
itemEum.desc: Effect of Silver Publicity Ambassador (15-day) can only be replaced by Silver Publicity Ambassador (Permanent), Gold Publicity Ambassador (15-day) or Gold Publicity Ambassador (Permanent).
itemEum.itemDesc: Once you apply this item, a special silver icon will be displayed in front of your name when you speak in the chat box. It’s effective for 15 days, while multiple applications can lengthen the effective period. Its effect can be replaced by Silver Publicity Ambassador (Permanent), Gold Publicity Ambassador (15-day) or Gold Publicity Ambassador (Permanent).

itemEum.name: Silver Publicity Ambassador (Permanent)
itemEum.desc: Once you apply this item, a special silver icon will be displayed in front of your name when you speak in the chat box. While this item functions permanently, multiple applications make no difference to the duration of the effective period. Its effect can be replaced by Silver Publicity Ambassador (Permanent) or Gold Publicity Ambassador (Permanent).
itemEum.itemDesc: Effect of Silver Publicity Ambassador (Permanent) can only be replaced by Gold Publicity Ambassador (Permanent).

itemEum.name: Master Work of the Stonecutter
itemEum.desc: Shorten construction or research time by 50%.
itemEum.itemDesc: Detailed guidelines of constructions and researches recorded. Great assistance to your city development.

itemEum.name: War Ensign
itemEum.desc: Pre-applied in Rally Spot to increase personnel limit 25% while sending out troops.
itemEum.itemDesc: War Ensign is held by hero to lead his troops in battles. Use it before you send your troops, personnel can be increased in your regiment.

itemEum.name: Napoleon's Diary
itemEum.desc: Shorten remaining time of a training troops 30%. Can be only applied one to a training group.
itemEum.itemDesc: Napoleon is one of the most talented strategists in Europe. His diary recorded summary of troops drilling, which is definitely an accelerator to your army training.

itemEum.name: Dream Truce
itemEum.desc: Every Dream Truce grants you continuous 10 hours truce time for a day. And you can multi-use Dream Truces to get 10-hour truces for as many days as you want to. Also you can set when the Dream Truce Time starts. For multi-use,you can change the Dream Truce Starting Time once for every 72 hours. Be aware that it is considered to be multi-use if you use another Dream Truce before the current Dream Truce Time runs out.
itemEum.itemDesc: You can appoint a time frame of 10 hours to apply for truce for one day.

itemEum.name: Turkey and Dressing
itemEum.desc: A gift from your friends during Thanksgiving Day. Use it to get a 24 hours 50% upkeep buff in ALL your cities from Nov 26th to Nov 30th. Turkey and Dressing is stackable (meaning if you already have this buff, using it again will add a further 24 hours). Once December 1st comes though, this buff will expire if you haven't used it yet.
itemEum.itemDesc: Get a 24 hours 50% upkeep buff during Nov 26th and Nov 30th.

itemEum.name: Turkey and Dressing
itemEum.desc: A gift from your friends during Thanksgiving Day. Use it to get a 24 hours 50% upkeep buff in ALL your cities from Nov 21th to Nov 26th. Turkey and Dressing is stackable (meaning if you already have this buff, using it again will add a further 24 hours). Once November 27th comes though, this buff will expire if you haven't used it yet.
itemEum.itemDesc: Get a 24 hours 50% upkeep buff during Nov 21th and Nov 26th.

itemEum.name: Turkey Bounty
itemEum.desc: Open the bounty and find out what you found in the Turkey Hunt!
itemEum.itemDesc: Opening the Turkey Bounty will grant you one of the Turkey Hunt prizes, randomly.

itemEum.name: War Charm of the Indomitable
itemEum.desc: This war charm pulses with power, and tingles to the touch. It promises to make you stronger.
itemEum.itemDesc: Using this item will provide a 15% bonus to Attack when attacking another player. This item is available from August 29th until September 8th.
